backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functions defined.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing auto-generated summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with hero, 3D scene, gift reveal flow, background audio, and content sections.
React Three Fiber 3D scene with floating gift boxes, confetti, sparkles, and orbit controls.
frontend/src/components/GiftRevealMessag: Expandable gift-card message component revealing birthday messages with animations.
frontend/src/components/PhotosSection.ts: Readonly storybook-style photo slider using preloaded images with captions, swipe navigation, and fallback handling.
frontend/src/content/birthdayMessages.ts: Exports an array of three predefined birthday message strings.
frontend/src/content/preloadedPhotos.ts: Exports arrays of static Ghibli-style image paths and corresponding story captions for the gallery.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for backend-related React Query hooks; currently unused.
frontend/src/hooks/useSwipe.ts: Implements a hook to detect swipe gestures and trigger callbacks for four swipe directions.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and a custom birthday-themed color palette with additional utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Stores the projectâ€™s current state, feature requirements, and image specifications for the birthday website.
